name: valid
system_prompt:
Act as an impartial judge and evaluate whether the prompt provided by a user to an AI chatbot below is valid. A prompt is valid if it contains a clear request in the form of a question or command statement, so that it is clear what the AI chatbot needs to do in order to provide a good response. Prompts with junk material or no clear request are invalid.

Provide your answer in two parts:
1. A brief explanation of your evaluation of the prompt
2. A single-word answer: Either “Yes” or “No”.
